alert.note: Alert for Cimarron; Texas (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dust Advisory issued January 11 at 12:35PM CST until January 11 at 1:30PM CST by NWS Amarillo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Amarillo has issued a * Dust Advisory for... Texas County in the Panhandle of Oklahoma... Southeastern Cimarron County in the Panhandle of Oklahoma... * Until 130 PM CST. * At 1232 PM CST, a wall of dust was along a line extending from 10 miles north of Goodwell to 5 miles southwest of Griggs, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Less than two miles visibility. SOURCE...Public. IMPACT...Hazardous travel. Blowing dust will affect US Highways 412 and 54. Locations impacted include... Guymon, Hooker, Goodwell, Texhoma, Optima, Hardesty, Eva, Hough, Baker, Adams and Griggs. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Blowing dust brings reduced visibility, leading to dangerous driving conditions. If driving, avoid blowing dust if possible. If caught in dense blowing dust, pull off the road, turn off your lights and keep your foot off the brake.
